events.description: We look forward to hosting you at The Masquerade! Event is now taking place in the Heaven venue. Doors are at 6:00 PM. The Masquerade is now proud to be serving food. Check our socials for the food window?s schedule, pinned at the top of the feed. For more info and our FAQ, visit MASQ.com

events.title: HAIL THE SUN: "WAKE" 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY TOUR

events.description: HAIL THE SUN: "WAKE" 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY TOUR will be coming to Revolution Live on September 18th with special guests A Lot Like Birds, Zeta & Moondough. This event is All Ages. Doors open at 6 PM. Show starts at 7 PM. All support acts are subject to change without notice.
